title: His...Only
description: The His & His Series is a set of standalone stories, each featuring a different couple.As a favor to a friend, furniture designer and woodworker Anthony Gardnier agrees to meet for a consultation with a wealthy prospective client who has a special project in mind. The last person he expected to see was Bruce McKesson, a man who could have stepped directly out of his fantasies. The last thing he expected to feel was an attraction that overrode his common sense. But Bruce wants him to do the impossible, something that had once awoken hidden longings that had cost Anthony everything once before.This story is intended for mature readers. 18+ for language and sexual content.
author: Agna Connor
